Title: Stock levels
Description: Keep track of key inventory items by product.   Help tell us what items we are out of by setting a min and max on certain items.
Name: Adam Hyer
Business Case: we  lose orders by not having the correct items in stock.  This stocking system would help us easily identify what we need to re-order.

Title: Daily Production Reports
Description: App to allow supervisors to enter their production reports and save the data
Name: Justin Stevenson
Business Case: This will allow for better data capture and the ability to track progress over time

Title: Daily Sales Report Subscription Email
Description: Recap of daily sales sent out at 8pm daily
Name: Adam Hyer
Business Case: Allows for self policing and daily recaps

Title: Project Ticketing System
Description: Create a ticket system to keep track of projects and review priority
Name: Jenny Heise

Title: Test Project Portal
Description: just test the portal like a ticket
Name: Tony Kubik

Title: Sales Data
Description:
I make a sales table with MTD Sales on it for the weekly Sales meeting.  Can this be automated?
I also would like to have some Inventory data automated that i use for the meeting
Name: Adam Hyer
Business Case: It takes me 20-30 minutes to make these reports every week.   Also, I do not have a back up on this so no one does this when I am off.

Title: Production Run Summary reports
Description: The current production run summary report is very hard to understand well.  It doesn't compare the  inputs vs. the outputs well to fully understand how the run yielded.    I can export this to Excel adn re-sort it - but that takes 5-10 minutes per work order review
Name: Adam Hyer
Business Case: This would help us analyze production runs a lot quick and catch issues

Title: Fix Emailed Shipment reports
Description: Sales people get an email when a load ships.  But it only gives the sales order number and shipment number.  Can this have all the information on the email?  I'd ask the sales team what data they want before you make this change.  But possibly the picking list or packing slip would be best to attach?
Name: Adam Hyer
Business Case: We have to copy the shipment number and then paste it into LT to find out what shipment this actually was.    And it is really hard to keep up with if you are traveling.

Title: EUDR Geo Locations
Description: Looking to see if you can re-create this and make geo-locations if i would send over some addresses so we can submit this for export shipments to the UK etc for a change coming in 2025
Name: Sara Stadler
Business Case: Export shipments.  I will email you a file copy from the company that created it

Title: Dry Side Packs/Hour
Description: We measure both Vision Tallies by Packs/Hour.  I'd like to know how many Packs/Hour each dry side line (Big, MP, LP & Rip) produce each hour.  The goal for Vision Tally is to tally every pack produced on the dry side every day before going home.
Name: Jeff Thebo
Business Case: All packs are tallied and placed in inventory ASAP.  This allows Sales to see what's available.

Title: FSC -> Lumbertrack
Description: Move the current FSC tracker into LT and faze out the use of Tallywood
Name: Justin Stevenson
Business Case: Tallywood is an older program and causes extra work to be done

Title: Sales Order Line Item Allocation
Description: Allow Jason to show allocation by line item to keep better record of what he is doing and what is going on from an allocation point of view
Name: Justin Stevenson
Business Case: Have a better system of allocating thus not doing it all on paper

Title: Employment Applications electronic
Description: Can we create employment applications (Truck Driver & standard) electronic so I could email a candidate the application and they can fill it out online and send it back?  Right now, the candidate would have to print it out and then scan it back or drop it off.
Name: Becky Sather
Business Case:
I will be able to receive applications faster and get truck drivers background checks and drug testing done quicker.  
The standard application is on the website, but it very basic.

Title: Min/Max Inventory order levels
Description: Establish min and max inventory levels, that would alert when re-order is needed and also raise a warning when too much inventory is on hand.
Name: Jenny Heise
Business Case: Improve inventory turns and have the proper inventory available to meet our customers needs.

Title: Vendor profitability
Description: Prepare a report that would show which vendors we historically have gained or lost on, when comparing their grading to our grading
Name: Jenny Heise
Business Case: This would provided guidance on which vendors we may want to do more or less business with depending on our historical results.  If we are always claiming a vendor, that process incurs additional time and money
